communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

For the multifamily property known as Quimby on 23rd located at 320 23rd Street South Arlington VA 22202 with Parcel ID 34-020-030, please provide the following information:

Notice and summary of any open/outstanding zoning, building, and/or fire code violations, or written confirmation that none currently exist;
Copies of Certificates of Occupancy, or if none are available, please state the reason for their absence and whether the lack of Certificates of Occupancy will result in any enforcement action; and
Copies of any zoning approval documents, specifically a copy of the National Center Site Plan #65.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tom Nash, a citizen of Virginia, in coordination with Olivia James.

title: Records Request - Eads and 18th STreet South

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

For the multifamily property known as Crystal Towers and Crytal Flats located at 1600 South Eads Street and 505 18th Street South Arlington VA 22202 with Parcel ID 5-011-010, 35-011-011, 35-011-001, please provide the following information:

Notice and summary of any open/outstanding zoning, building, and/or fire code violations, or written confirmation that none currently exist;
Copies of Certificates of Occupancy, or if none are available, please state the reason for their absence and whether the lack of Certificates of Occupancy will result in any enforcement action; and
Copies of any zoning approval documents, specifically a copy of the Crystal Towers Site Plan #13 and 1720 S Eads Street Site Plan #424

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tom Nash, a citizen of Virginia, in coordination with Olivia James.
